definition: insane and believed to be affected by the phases of the moon, a reckless impetuous irresponsible person
details:
adjective
- insane and believed to be affected by the phases of the moon
= synonyms: moonstruck
noun
- a reckless impetuous irresponsible person
= synonyms: harum-scarum
- an insane person
= synonyms: madman, maniac
